column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Sɛ nyimpa bi nya no honam wer mu biribi soaa
column5: anaa ntwintwamee
column6: anaa ntokowa ntokowa
column7: anaa odzidzi no honam wer mu yɛ kwata ntsetsewee a
column8: ɔno wɔmfa no mbra ɔsɔfo Aaron
column9: anaa ne mbabanyin asɔfo no mu kor:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ honam wer no mu: na sɛ nhwi a ɔwɔ ntsetsewee no mu adan fitaa na ntsetsewee no enyi atotɔ mu asen no honam wer no a
column3: ɔyɛ kwata ntsetsewee; na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no
column4: na ɔnka dɛ no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na sɛ ntokowa ntokowa no yɛ fitaa wɔ no honam wer no mu
column3: na n'enyi nntotɔɔ mu nnsen wer no
column4: na no nhwi no nndaan fitaa a
column5: ɔno ɔsɔfo no ntow ɔyarfo no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no: na ɔhwɛ na sɛ ntsetsewee no esianka wɔ n'enyi do
column3: na ntsetsewee no nntserɛwee wɔ wer no mu a
column4: ɔno asɔfo no ntow no mu nda esuon bio:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no bio: na
column5: na ntsetsewee no nntserɛwee wɔ wer no mu a
column6: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho tsew: ɔyɛ ntwintwamee: na ɔnhor ne ntar

column2: "Mbom ɔdze noho akɛkyerɛ ɔsɔfo no wɔ n'ahotsewee ho ekyir no
column3: na sɛ ntwintwamee no tserɛw wɔ wer no mu a
column4: ɔmfa no ho nkɛkyerɛ ɔsɔfo no bio:"

column2: "na sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ na sɛ ntwintwamee no atserɛw wɔ wer no mu a
column3: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ kwata."

column2: "Sɛ kwata ntsetsewee wɔ nyimpa bi ho a
column3: ɔno wɔmfa no mbra ɔsɔfo no;"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ
column5: sɛ biribi fitaa soaa bi wɔ wer no mu
column6: na ɔadan nhwi no fitaa
column7: na honam momon rupuw wɔ soaa no mu a
column9: "ɔyɛ kwata dadaw a ɔwɔ no honam wer no mu
column10: na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: mma ɔnntow no mu: na no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na sɛ kwata no epue efi wer no mu
column3: na kwata no akata owuyarfo no no wer nyinara ho fi n'etsifi keka n'ananadze dɛ mbrɛ ɔda edzi ma ɔsɔfo no ara a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ: na
column4: sɛ kwata no akata no honam nyinara do a
column5: ɔnka dɛ owuyarfo no no ho tsew: ne nyinara adan fitaa: no ho tsew."

column2: "Mbom aber biara a honam momon ada edzi wɔ no ho no
"Na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ honam momon no
column3: na ɔnka dɛ no ho nntsew: honam momon no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ kwata."

column2: "Anaa sɛ honam momon no dan fitaa bio a
column5: "na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no: na
column6: hwɛ
column7: sɛ ntsetsewee no dan fitaa a
column8: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ ɔyarfo no no ho tsew: na no ho atsew."

column2: "Na sɛ pɔmpɔ bi bɔ wɔ honam no wer no mu
column5: "na soaa fitaa bi bɔsoa anaa ntokowa ntokowa fitaa
column6: ɔberhoamu

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ
column5: sɛ n'enyi atotɔ mu asen wer no; na no nhwi no adan fitaa a
column6: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ kwata ntsetsewee

column2: "Mbom sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ
column5: na ɔnntotɔ mu nnsen wer no
column6: na n'enyi dum a
column7: ɔno ɔsɔfo no ntow no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na sɛ ɔtserɛw wɔ wer no mu a
column3: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ ntsetsewee."

column2: "Mbom sɛ ntokowa ntokowa no sianka n'ananmu
column4: ɔyɛ pɔmpɔ no itua; na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho tsew."

column2: "Anaa sɛ gya hyew ano tua bi ba honam no wer no mu
column3: na ɔhyew ano tua no do rupuw yɛ ntokowa ntokowa
column5: anaa fitaa a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ: na
column4: sɛ nhwi a ɔwɔ ntokowa ntokowa no do adan fitaa
column5: na n'enyi atotɔ mu asen wer no a; ɔyɛ kwata
column6: oepue wɔ ɔhyew ano tua no mu: na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ kwata ntsetsewee."

column2: "Mbom sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ
column3: na sɛ nhwi fitaa bi nnyi ntokowa ntokowa no mu
column4: na ɔnntotɔɔ mu nnseen wer no
column5: na n'enyi dum a: ɔno ɔsɔfo no ntow no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no: sɛ ɔtserɛw wɔ wer no mu a
column3: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ kwata ntsetsewee."

column2: "Na sɛ ntokowa ntokowa no sianka wɔ n'ananmu
column3: na ɔanntserɛw wɔ wer no mu
column4: na n'enyi dum a; ɔyɛ ɔhyew ano tua soaa
column5: na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho tsew: na ɔyɛ ɔhyew ano tua no itua."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa bi nya ntsetsewee wɔ n'etsifi anaa n'abɔdwesa mu a
column4: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ ntsetsewee no: na
column5: hwɛ
column6: sɛ n'enyi atotɔ mu asen wer no
column7: na nhwi memen tseatseaba bi wɔ mu a
column8: ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew: ɔyɛ ntutui
column9: ɔyɛ tsir anaa abɔdwesa mu kwata."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ ntutui ne ntsetsewee no
column5: n'enyi nntotɔ mu nnsen wer no
column6: na nhwi tuntum bi nnyi mu a
column7: ɔno ɔsɔfo no ntow ntutui ɔyarfo no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ ntsetsewee no; na
column5: na nhwi memen bi nnyi mu
column6: na ntutui no n'enyim nntotɔ mu nnsen wer no a
column9: mbom ntutui no na mma wɔnntwerɛw; na ɔsɔfo no ntow nyia ɔyar ntutui no mu nda esuon bio:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no mu ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ ntutui no: na
column4: sɛ ntutui no nntserɛw wer no do
column5: na n'enyi nntotɔ mu nnsen wer no a; ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho tsew: na ɔnhor ne ntar
column6: na no ho ntsew."

column2: "Mbom n'ahotsewee ekyir no sɛ ntutui no tserɛw wɔ wer no mu a;"
"ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no; na
column4: sɛ ntutui no atserɛw wɔ wer no mu a
column5: mma ɔsɔfo no nnhwehwɛ nhwi memen no; no ho nntsew."

column2: "Mbom sɛ ntutui no yɛ n'enyiwa do dɛ oesianka
column3: na nhwi tuntum efuw wɔ mu a; ntutui no asa
column4: no ho atsew: na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho atsew."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa nya ntokowa ntokowa fitaa wɔ no honam wer mu a;"
"ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ: na
column4: sɛ ntokowa ntokowa a n'enyi dum fitaa na ɔwɔ hɔn honam wer mu a; ɔyɛ ayam na oepue wɔ wer no mu; no ho tsew."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi no nhwi pepa wɔ n'etsifi a
column3: ɔyɛ otsipaa; naaso no ho tsew."

column2: "Na sɛ no nhwi pepa wɔ n'etsifi enyim afamu a
column3: ɔyɛ pampamu tsipaa; na no ho tsew."

column2: "Mbom sɛ ntsetsewee ɔberhoamu bi tow ne tsipaa no mu
column3: anaa ne pampamu paa no mu a; ɔyɛ kwata a orupue ne tsipaa
column4: anaa ne pampamu paa no mu."

column2: "Nkyii ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ no: na sɛ ntsetsewee no soaa no yɛ ɔberhoamu wɔ ne tsipaa no mu
column3: anaa ne pampamu paa no mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ kwata firii tse wɔ honam wer no mu a;"

column2: "ɔyɛ ɔkwatanyi
column3: no ho nntsew: ka ara na ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ no ho nntsew; ne ntsetsewee wɔ n'etsifi."

column2: "Na ɔkwatanyi a ɔyar no wɔ no ho no
column5: na ɔnkata n'anofamfa sor no
column6: na ɔntsea mu dɛ

column2: "Nda dodow a yar no wɔ no ho no nyinara no ho renntsew; no ho nntsew: noara nkotoo ntsena; nseraban no ekyir na ɔnyɛ ne tsenabew."
"Atar so a kwata ntsetsewee wɔ mu no
"sɛ ndwera
column4: ne nsa anaa ne mfa mu o; sɛ nwoma
column5: anaa adze biara a wɔdze nwoma ayɛ mu o;"

column2: "sɛ ntsetsewee no yɛ ebunebun anaa ɔberber wɔ atar no mu
column5: anaa mfa no mu
column6: anaa nwoma adze biara mu a; ɔyɛ kwata ntsetsewee

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ ntsetsewee no
column3: na ɔntow ntsetsewee adze no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔnhwɛ ntsetsewee no: sɛ ntsetsewee no atserɛw wɔ atar no mu
column5: anaa nwoma no mu
column6: anaa biribiara a wɔdze nwoma ayɛ no mu a; ntsetsewee no yɛ kwata a ɔwewe; no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na ɔnhyew atar no
column5: wɔ kuntu mu
column6: anaa ndwera mu
column7: anaa nwoma adze biara a ntsetsewee no wɔ mu no: na ɔyɛ kwata a ɔwewe; wɔnhyew no wɔ gya mu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ
column5: ntsetsewee no nntserɛw wɔ atar no mu
column6: wɔ nsa no mu
column8: anaa nwoma adze biara mu a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ ma wɔnhor adze no a ntsetsewee no wɔ mu no
column3: na ɔntow no mu nda esuon bio:"

column2: "na ɔahor ntsetsewee no ekyir no
column3: ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ: na sɛ ntsetsewee no nnsakyeer n'enyi
column5: no ho nntsew; dza atow mu no wɔ mu o
column6: ekyir o hyew no wɔ ogya mu: osiandɛ ɔyɛ nwewee."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔsɔfo no hwɛ
column5: ntsetsewee no no hor ekyir no n'enyi edum a
column6: ɔno ɔntsew mfi atar no ho

column2: "Na sɛ ɔda ho pue wɔ atar no mu
column5: anaa nwoma adze biara no mu a
column6: na orupue: fa gya hyew dza ntsetsewee no wɔ mu no."

column2: "Na atar no
column5: anaa nwoma adze biara a ebɔhor no
column6: sɛ ntsetsewee no fi mu a

column2: "Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma kwata ntsetsewee wɔ kuntu anaa ndwera atar ho
column5: ma wɔdze aaka dɛ no ho tsew
column6: anaa wɔdze aaka dɛ no ho nntsew."
